title: Suggestion on champ to carry
body:
Can't play Kat anymore, gets banned and counter picked too often
I suck at Riven
Not great at Ori

Thinking maybe Anivia due to her passive?
I'm exceptional at Malzahar but he can't carry games it seems

replies.body:
I actually don't even ban Kat anymore, just not enough of a problem anymore. 
RIven is GREAT at carrying, a head and shoulders above all the op champions in the game in my opinion so if you can practice her and get better at her, do it.
Ori is one of my favourite champions and is my favourite Ranked 5's Champion to play but I don't find her to be a great Solo Q pick.

I'm gonna speak strictly from the mid lane here as I don't really play anything else. You want someone who you get yourself fed with, someone with escapes, a strong laner, can 1v1 and roam. Basically someone who you don't have to rely on team mates for.

My Solo Queue mid lane pool goes a little something like

Ahri, Lissandra, Talon and Zed. I also SOMETIMES pick Ori if the team comp allows it. (Strong front line and peel in the team comp, strong initiation and strong teamfight).

Syndra, Cassiopeia, Fizz and Nidalee are also not bad.

I think malz is strong for a couple of reasons.

#1 Strong lv6. Laner is either forced out of lane, or dies.

#2 safe farming. You dont need to be that close to the creep wave when you have e + void baby early, and later you dont even need the void baby

#3 forces ADC to buy QSS, half of them dont buy it anyway (low elo)

#4 can remove the strongest enemy team member from the game each fight

#5 people in soloq are less reliable to CC him during ult.

As for those matchups, diana can be hard, zed is easy up until (if) he gets QSS, twisted fate is relatively easy, leblanc is pretty even IMO just be careful pre6.

I find for ADC jinx is awesome. As long as you know how to lane correctly and build her, she facerolls mid game. I second the Malz. One of my fav AP champs. Ziggs is also good (think of his W) I also find teemo carries really well top too IF you know how to play and build him properly If you build him right, you will almost never get caught, and always catch champs. Yi is easy and good for Jungle but easily countered by teemo. Another great pick is amumu top.

Ebola here. Yeah I love Jinx, my fav ADC, get her with someone like thresh or blitz, chomper where the enemy is going to land and enjoy 4-5 seconds of CC. 

I like all of the champs you suggested, Amumu top sounds super interesting though

Dude just play your favourite champ, get good at him and carry with it. I'm carrying myself out with nautilus and there are easily plenty of better hyper carry junglers than him, I:e vi, xin, lee, rek'sai, ect
Malzahar can carry games, but he's dependant, in a way to his team to peel aggressively so his ult don't get fucked over.

All about what you want to play, dont get sucked into thinking you have to flow with the meta :)

Ebola here. I mostly like Malz because he is great for catching out of position people (which happens a lot in Gold). Their support step out of position too much in a team fight? Boom, they just got ulted and malefic visions chunked someone near them. Now it's a 4v5. This happens so often, sometimes their mid, ADC or jungler

And trying so hard not to just flow with the meta, but when everyone else does it can be a bit tricky :( like legit, mid every game is zed, LB, Diana, TF. And lately randomly Kass. But it's just so stale how much people just try to play FOTM champs
Malz is legit the best soloq champion in the game. He carries games.
I do have a 56% win rate with him, I'd just rather have something like 70-80% haha :D

Quinn if played well can carry as fk and some lower elo players don't know quinns damage so i go quinn mid with a zed sorta build focusing on armour pen. {{champion:133}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:133}}

Malz can't carry games?

his been sitting around the 54% win rate for quite a while, and can solo carry games if your good enough on him.

can also carry if your team has half a brain*
FTFY
I always win lane as Malz. Always. But I find you have less impact for the rest of your team
Yorick, he seriously is so underrated and no one knows how to verse him because they have never seen him before.
Yeah I noticed he had a ridiculous win rate, obviously top only yeah?

Step 1:Get good at Riven
Step 2:???
Step 3:ELO
Yeah I'm thinking I might go back to my smurf and only play Riven. That way once I hit 30 should have a decent amount of experience
